title: Crypto AG, Part 3: The Truth Is Revealed
description: By the 1970s, Crypto AG was a large and thriving company, employing over 400 people. This final episode of the series is going to explore how a spying operation affecting over 100 countries, for 70 years, was kept secret the whole time -- from governments, from militaries and intelligence services, and even the company’s own personnel.
